messages.user: Hi, this is Hansong. I need advise for weight losing.
messages.assistant:
Great to hear that you are interested in working with me. I would love to provide you with advice for weight losing. Please provide me with your current weight and initial goal weight. This will help me to get a better understanding of your situation and provide more accurate and effective advice.

I am more than happy to provide you with personalized advice on diet, exercise, and lifestyle changes to help you achieve your weight loss goals. I will conduct a consultation to understand your specific needs, concerns, and goals. Based on this consultation, I will provide you with a customized plan that is tailored to your unique situation.

My approach is integrative, which means that I combine various approaches to health and weight-loss, such as stress management, nutrition, exercise, and lifestyle changes. I believe that a comprehensive approach is essential to achieve sustained weight loss and overall health.

Before we get started, I would like to ask you a few questions to gather more information about your situation. Please fill out the following form with your answers:

[Insert form here]

I will be in touch with you soon to discuss your weight loss goals and provide you with a customized plan. Thank you for choosing me as your health and weight-loss assistant. I look forward to assisting you on your journey to a healthier you.
